archival_memory.diabetes_medication: Metformin 1000 mg twice daily; recently added semaglutide(Ozempic) at a low dose.
archival_memory.hypertension_management: Stress management and reducing sodium intake recommended instead of increasing dosage.
archival_memory.magnesium_supplement: Takes daily magnesium supplement for blood pressure regulation.
archival_memory.hypothyroidism_management: Takes on an empty stomach and waits at least 30 minutes before eating.
archival_memory.hypothyroidism_tsh: Last TSH test at 2.1 mIU/L, within normal range.
archival_memory.hypothyroidism_dose_tracking: Uses a pill organizer to stay on track.
archival_memory.osteoarthritis_management: Takes acetaminophen as needed for mild pain.
archival_memory.osteoarthritis_medication: Meloxicam 7.5 mg as prescribed for inflammation, not taken daily.
archival_memory.osteoarthritis_symptoms: Helps with stiffness in knees and hands.
archival_memory.glucosamine_supplements: Suggested by doctor, unsure of effectiveness.
archival_memory.vitamin_d_intake: Takes vitamin D3 2,000 IU daily due to low levels(22 ng/mL).
archival_memory.calcium_supplements: Takes calcium supplements due to early signs of osteopenia.
archival_memory.vitamin_k2_combination: Combines calcium with vitamin K2 for better absorption.
archival_memory.cholesterol_levels: LDL at 130 mg/dL, triglycerides at 140 mg/dL.
archival_memory.statin_effectiveness: Cholesterol numbers improving, no side effects reported.
archival_memory.general_health_supplements: Takes a daily multivitamin, omega-3 supplements, and probiotics.
archival_memory.digestive_support: Takes digestive enzymes if eating heavier foods due to gallbladder removal.
archival_memory.gallbladder_removal_effects: Changed digestion of fatty foods, needs to be mindful.
archival_memory.medication_interactions: Monitors potential interactions between losartan and meloxicam; avoids frequent meloxicam use.
archival_memory.thyroid_medication_precautions: Takes thyroid medication separately from calcium and iron supplements to avoid absorption interference.
archival_memory.medication_routine: Overall routine is working well; uses a pill planner and phone reminders.
archival_memory.lifestyle_changes: Focuses on lifestyle changes to reduce reliance on medications.
archival_memory.health_goals: Aims to stay healthy and avoid unnecessary prescriptions by managing naturally.
